description: Get a specific recommendation within an AWS Organizations organization. This API supports only prioritized recommendations.

nested_items.name: organizationRecommendation
nested_items.description: The Recommendation.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Recommendation.

nested_items.name: awsServices
nested_items.description: The AWS Services that the Recommendation applies to.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: checkArn
nested_items.description: The AWS Trusted Advisor Check ARN that relates to the Recommendation.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: When the Recommendation was created, if created by AWS Trusted Advisor Priority.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The creator, if created by AWS Trusted Advisor Priority.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for AWS Trusted Advisor recommendations.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID which identifies where the Recommendation was produced.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: When the Recommendation was last updated.

nested_items.name: lifecycleStage
nested_items.description: The lifecycle stage from AWS Trusted Advisor Priority.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the AWS Trusted Advisor Recommendation.

nested_items.name: pillarSpecificAggregates
nested_items.description: The pillar aggregations for cost savings.

nested_items.name: costOptimizing
nested_items.description: Cost optimizing aggregates.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: estimatedPercentMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: The estimated percently monthly savings.

nested_items.name: pillars
nested_items.description: The Pillars that the Recommendation is optimizing.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: resolvedAt
nested_items.description: When the Recommendation was resolved.

nested_items.name: resourcesAggregates
nested_items.description: An aggregation of all resources.

nested_items.name: errorCount
nested_items.description: The number of AWS resources that were flagged to have errors according to the Trusted Advisor check.

nested_items.name: okCount
nested_items.description: The number of AWS resources that were flagged to be OK according to the Trusted Advisor check.

nested_items.name: warningCount
nested_items.description: The number of AWS resources that were flagged to have warning according to the Trusted Advisor check.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source of the Recommendation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Recommendation.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Whether the Recommendation was automated or generated by AWS Trusted Advisor Priority.

nested_items.name: updateReason
nested_items.description: Reason for the lifecycle stage change.

nested_items.name: updateReasonCode
nested_items.description: Reason code for the lifecycle state change.

nested_items.name: updatedOnBehalfOf
nested_items.description: The person on whose behalf a Technical Account Manager (TAM) updated the recommendation. This information is only available when a Technical Account Manager takes an action on a recommendation managed by AWS Trusted Advisor Priority.

nested_items.name: updatedOnBehalfOfJobTitle
nested_items.description: The job title of the person on whose behalf a Technical Account Manager (TAM) updated the recommendation. This information is only available when a Technical Account Manager takes an action on a recommendation managed by AWS Trusted Advisor Priority.
